meanings.definition: A particular part or feature of something
meanings.sent1: The different aspects of the puzzle were challenging to put together.
meanings.sent2: She admired the artistic aspects of the painting.
meanings.sent3: The aspect of the cake with extra frosting made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: His personality had many colorful aspects that intrigued others.
meanings.sent5: The aspect of kindness in her actions shone brightly.

meanings.definition: The way in which something can be viewed or considered
meanings.sent1: From a scientific aspect, the experiment was a success.
meanings.sent2: They discussed the financial aspects of the business proposal.
meanings.sent3: Looking at it from a different aspect, the problem seemed simpler.
meanings.sent4: The aspect of time as a healer is often underestimated.
meanings.sent5: The aspect of friendship brings warmth to our lives.
